archimate:Requirement.name: SC.1.2.3b: b) determining cross-border/multi-jurisdictional legislative and regulatory requirements (e.g. those relating to privacy, data protection, encryption export and data breach notification)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
